text: Brahim Benmokrane is a Canadian civil engineer, currently a Canada Research Chair in Composite Materials used in Civil Engineering Structures and Research Chair in Innovative FRP Reinforcement for Sustainable Concrete Infrastructure at University of Sherbrooke and a Fellow of the Royal Society of Canada. ==References== == External links == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Université de Sherbrooke faculty Category:Canadian civil engineers Category:Université de Sherbrooke alumni
title: Brahim Benmokrane
